name: Akira Chen
story: A talented cyber-engineer who needs advanced neural implant surgery to continue protecting the digital realm from data corruption attacks.

name: Luna Nakamura
story: Former data-detective requiring emergency memory reconstruction surgery after a dangerous encounter with rogue AI entities.

story: Young hacker needing specialized bio-circuitry treatment to repair damage from overclocking their neural interface.

story: Security specialist requiring urgent cybernetic immune system upgrade after exposure to viral malware.

story: Digital artist whose creative neural pathways need repair after a traumatic data breach incident.

story: Former corporate cyber-warrior needing advanced neural shielding to protect against psi-attacks.
